title: Greece - Spirit of Place -  Durrell, Leigh-Fermor & Kazantza
description:
'Spirit of Place', a 1975 bbc documentary on and spoken by Lawrence Durrell Ã¢â‚¬â€œ his travel writings on Greece evocatively visualised (allowing for age the video quality is first-rate) Plus extracts from documentaries on Patrick Leigh-Fermor, Kazantzakis, and the scenic parts of Corfu from the telemovie 'My family and other animals', the memoirs of Gerald Durrell.

These are DVD files but compressed to a little over their original size by Cinema Craft Encoder and DVD Rebuilder i.e they are as good as the originals. Kindly seed - I can only do so for a few weeks.
